title: Real Estate Landing: Swap hero background image to myplace-hero2.jpeg

requirements.summary: Swap the landing page Hero section background to the uploaded myplace-hero2.jpeg and remove any non-image overlays while keeping the Hero layout unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx` uses `myplace-hero2.jpeg` as the hero background image source.
The new hero image file is included as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/` (or the projectâ€™s existing public assets location) so it loads in production builds.

No additional visual adjustments are applied to the uploaded image (no overlays/gradients, darkening filters, tint layers, or cropping edits performed outside the existing `object-cover object-center` rendering).
Hero section height and layout remain unchanged (e.g., still `min-h-screen`, same content positioning and spacing).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded hero image as a public static asset so it is available in production builds at `frontend/public/assets/myplace-hero2.jpeg`.

Update the hero background source to `/assets/myplace-hero2.jpeg` and remove the existing gradient/overlay layer so the image is used exactly as-is, while keeping the section structure, height (`min-h-screen`), and layout unchanged.
